answers.answer: Wait for them to take blood out every hour.. its the worst thing ever I had to do it at 10 weeks and almost past out. This last time I just did the hour test
Read this app. Or bring a book. My hubby wanted to go with me, so I had someone to talk to. Mine was a 2 hour test.
Its to make sure you don't have diabetes in pregnancy I don't think its a stupid test. Its for the health of you and baby

question: Had a doctor appointment today and he is sending me to take a 3 hour glucose test. What am I suppose to do for 3 hours????
title: Stupid Test
